    The Wizard's special attack The player heals his health and regains his amount of intelligence times 2 health points.
    int checkCure()
    Check that the Wizard does not gain more life points than he initially had We recover the starting life points of the magician We calculate the life points gained by the care spell We subtract in order to apply the maximum possible value to recover

  • Constructor Details

    • Wizard

      public Wizard​(java.lang.String pName, int pLevel, int pHP, int pStrength, int pAgility, int pIntel)
      Wizard Builder Customization of the attributes 'class presentation' and 'battle cry'. Customization of basic and special attacks.
      Parameters:
      pName - player name
      pLevel - player level
      pHP - player health points
      pStrength - player strength
      pAgility - player dexterity
      pIntel - player Intellect

  • Method Details

    • description

      public java.lang.String description()
      Implements the description of the Wizard
      Overrides:
      description in class Player
      Returns:
      battle cry, class intro, and description of player characteristics
      See Also:
      # description ()

    • attackBasic

      public void attackBasic​(Player player)
      The Wizard's basic attack against a player opponent Deals damage equal to player's intelligence on the opponent. Displays the life points lost by the opponent. Updates the opponent's health points. Checks if the opponent is dead (zero hit points)
      Overrides:
      attackBasic in class Player
      Parameters:
      player - opponent
      See Also:
      # attackBasic (Player), # attackBasic (Player), # attackBasic (Player)

    • attackSpecial

      public void attackSpecial​(Player player)
      The Wizard's special attack The player heals his health and regains his amount of intelligence times 2 health points. He can't have more life than he started out with. Updates the wizard's health points and displays it.
      Overrides:
      attackSpecial in class Player
      Parameters:
      player - the Wizard itself
      See Also:
      ()

    • checkCure

      public int checkCure()
      Check that the Wizard does not gain more life points than he initially had We recover the starting life points of the magician We calculate the life points gained by the care spell We subtract in order to apply the maximum possible value to recover
      Returns:
      the number of hit points recovered by the healing spell
